about_the_game:
Create your own planet in the immense starry sky.

Starry Navigator is a role-playing recreational farming game. You can build your own planet with adorable animals. Planting flowers and breeding. Gaining starry energy to repair the interstellar train system. When the interstellar train starts, it will take you to explore the unknown universe and weave new stories with your animal friends on other planets. Pushing the story forward by diligent planting. Reopen the ancient galaxy routes, and try to make the desolate universe prosperous again!

Have you ever imagined a planet of your own?
Have you ever imagined meeting the fox that belongs to you in the long universe just like the little prince?

What will happen to the earth in 1000 years? The ability of humans to live in space without the support of the earth 1000 years later gave rise to a new occuption- interstellar navigator- to direct travelers between the stars. In the cosmic age, driving interstellar spacecraft or trains will no longer require human labor. However, every interstellar train requires a navigator to ensure the correct in the event that the driving machinery fails for safety reasons. In this era, humanity discovered a new energy known as "starry enery", which serves as the fuel for the interstellar train.

By understanding the speed of light, humans have discovered a new way to prodyct energy_ starry energy. This kind of energy can be found in biological processes. Huamns invented robots and other machinery, as well as mechanical devices that can collect and transform energy into other forms. The period of peace, however, is only temporary, as the majority of the universe's inhabited areas are now under attack, and you are one of them...

Fortunately, you finally woke up after a long darkness. What unexpected encounters will you have next?
detailed_description:
Create your own planet in the immense starry sky.

Starry Navigator is a role-playing recreational farming game. You can build your own planet with adorable animals. Planting flowers and breeding. Gaining starry energy to repair the interstellar train system. When the interstellar train starts, it will take you to explore the unknown universe and weave new stories with your animal friends on other planets. Pushing the story forward by diligent planting. Reopen the ancient galaxy routes, and try to make the desolate universe prosperous again!

In the cosmic age, driving interstellar spacecraft or trains will no longer require human labor. However, every interstellar train requires a navigator to ensure the correct in the event that the driving machinery fails for safety reasons. In this era, humanity discovered a new energy known as "starry enery", which serves as the fuel for the interstellar train.

Fortunately, you finally woke up after a long darkness. What unexpected encounters will you have next?
name: Starry Navigator 星际领航员 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Starry Navigator is a RPG casual farming game. You can build your own planet with cute animals by planting. Gaining starry energy, the interstellar train will take you to explore the unknown universe, weave new stories with animal friends. Reopen galaxy routes and reflourish the desolate universe.
